tool_description:
Reliable real-time country data API for your business.
Retrieve instant, accurate information for
any country in the world in lightweight JSON format.
name: countrylayer
title: countrylayer

api_list.name: get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countrylayer.p.rapidapi.com/api.countrylayer.com/v2/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countrylayer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countrylayer.p.rapidapi.com/api.countrylayer.com/v2/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countrylayer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
